name: Beom-Joon Kim
content: Beomjoon Kim (김범준) Beomjoon Kim {firstname}.{lastname} at kaist.ac.kr I am an Associate Professor in Graduate School of AI at KAIST. I direct the Humanoid Generalization (HuGe) lab, where we have several research internship positions available. I am interested in creating general-purpose humanoids that can efficiently make decisions in complex environments. Previously, I obtained my Ph.D. in computer science from MIT CSAIL, my MSc in computer science from McGill University, and my BMath in computer science and statistics from University of Waterloo. CV  / Google Scholar / Github / Twitter Recent research Check out my talk at MIT Embodied Intelligence seminar for our recent effort in developing a general-purpose robot.
